DOC.brief_summary: This study investigate effect smoke metabolism single oral dose GW876008 .
DOC.brief_title: A Study To Investigate The Metabolism Of GW876008 In Smokers Compared To Non-Smokers .
DOC.criteria: Healthy male female . Normal ECG . Nonsmokers ( abstinence smoking least 6 month start study ) smoker smoke 10 30 cigarette , inclusive , per day , least 2 month prior screen . Subjects must agree abstain alcohol 24 hour prior start dose collection final pharmacokinetic sample . Any serious medical disorder condition . Any clinically significant laboratory abnormality . History psychiatric illness . Any history suicidal attempt behavior . Active peptic ulcer disease . Positive faecal occult blood . Current recent ( within one year ) gastrointestinal disease ; history malabsorption , oesophageal reflux , irritable bowel syndrome ; frequent ( week ) occurrence heartburn ; surgical intervention ( e.g. , cholecystectomy ) would expect influence absorption drug . Female subject currently plan become pregnant lactating ( screen least 8 week receive study drug ) .
